createBot.description: Creates a new bot that will join a meeting

props.name: meeting_url
props.description: The URL of the meeting (e.g., https://zoom.us/j/123?pwd=456)

props.name: bot_name
props.description: The name of the bot that will be displayed in the call (max 100 characters). Defaults to "Meeting Notetaker"

props.name: automatic_leave
props.description: Configure when the bot automatically leaves the meeting

props.name: metadata
props.description: Custom metadata to attach to the bot

retrieveBot.description: Get details about a specific bot instance

props.name: bot_id
props.description: A UUID string identifying the bot

sendChatMessage.description: Causes the bot to send a message in the meeting chat

props.name: bot_id
props.description: A UUID string identifying the bot

props.name: message
props.description: The message that will be sent (max 4096 characters)

props.name: to
props.description: The person or group that the message will be sent to. Defaults to "everyone". On non-Zoom platforms, only "everyone" is supported

props.name: pin
props.description: Whether to pin the message in the chat
